description: This file implements human-in-the-loop functionality for an AI agent, including user confirmation prompts before executing certain tools, specifically fetching top Hacker News stories. It defines a tool with confirmation requirements, runs the agent asynchronously, handles user prompts for confirmation, and continues execution based on user input.

classes.description: An AI agent that manages tools and models for executing tasks.
